page.title: 14Peterlee's Faults.
page.content:
I don't like living in{Peterlee because it is very{untidy.}There are plenty of litter bins in towns, but there is still{litter}floating about Peterlee.
Peterlee has lots of{schools}and children travel in from all the surrounding areas to go to them.
Peterlee has a large amount of{grassed {areas,}but most of it you can't play on .
Peterlee has quite a good{shopping {centre,}but I don't like shopping. The {prices of food}are very high, which means people struggle to be able to afford them.
There should also be more places for children to play.
